metadata.titleEn: Multi-scale surface flux and meteorological elements observation dataset in the Hai River Basin (Guantao site-automatic weather station) (2008-2010)
metadata.titleCn: 海河流域多尺度地表通量与气象要素观测数据集：馆陶站-自动气象站（2008-2010）
metadata.description:
The data set contains observations from the automatic weather station as of 31 December 2010 as of 1 solstice January 2008.The site is located in hezhai village, guantao county, hebei province.The latitude and longitude of the observation point is 115.1274E, 36.5150N, and the altitude is 30m.

The acquisition frequency of the automatic weather station is 10s, and the output of 10min is once.The observation factors include air temperature and relative humidity (12.5m), and the direction is due north.Wind speed (12.7m), wind direction (12.7m), heading due north;Air pressure (installed in waterproof box);Rainfall (16m);Net radiation/four-component radiation (15.6m), facing due south;Infrared surface temperature (15.7m), the arm is facing south, the probe is facing vertically downward;The soil temperature and humidity probe was buried 2m south of the meteorological tower. The buried depth of the soil temperature probe was 0cm, 2cm, 5cm, 10cm, 20cm, 40cm, 60cm, 80cm and 100cm. The buried depth of the soil moisture sensor was 2cm, 5cm, 10cm, 10cm, 10cm, 10cm, 20cm, 60cm, 80cm and 100cm.Two soil hot plates (2) were buried 2cm underground, one under the vegetation and the other between the trees.Processing and quality control of observation data :(1) ensure 144 data per day (every 10min). If data is missing, it will be marked by -6999;(2) eliminate the moments with duplicate records;(3) data that is obviously beyond the physical meaning or the range of the instrument is deleted;(4) the format of date and time is unified, and the date and time are in the same column.For example, the time is: June 10, 2010 at 10:30.

Data released by the automatic weather station include:Date/Time, air temperature and humidity observation (ta_12.5m, rh_12.5m) (℃, %), wind speed (ws_12.7m) (m/s), wind direction (wd_12.7m) (°), pressure (Press) (hpa), precipitation (Rain) (mm), four-component radiation (DR, UR, DLR_Cor, ULR_Cor, Rn) (W/m2), surface radiation temperature (IRT_1, IRT_2) (℃),Soil heat flux (Gs_1, Gs_2) (W/m2), multi-layer soil moisture (Ms_2cm, Ms_5cm, Ms_10cm, Ms_20cm, Ms_40cm, Ms_60cm, Ms_100cm) (%) and multi-layer soil temperature (Ts_0cm, Ts_2cm, Ts_5cm, Ts_10cm, Ts_20cm, Ts_40cm, Ts_60cm, Ts_80cm, Ts_100cm) (℃).

Please refer to Jia et al,(2012) for information of observation test or site, and Liu et al,(2013) for data processing.
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包含了2008年1月1日至2010年12月31日的自动气象站观测数据。站点位于河北省馆陶县河寨村，下垫面是玉米/小麦，棉花。观测点的经纬度是115.1274E，36.5150N，海拔30m。

自动气象站的采集频率为10s，且10min输出一次。观测要素包括空气温度、相对湿度（12.5m），朝向为正北；风速（12.7m），风向（12.7m），朝向为正北；气压（安装在防水箱内）；雨量（16m）；净辐射/四分量辐射（15.6m），朝向为正南；红外表面温度（15.7m），支臂朝向正南，探头朝向是垂直向下；土壤温湿度探头埋设在气象塔正南方2m处，土壤温度探头埋设深度为0cm、2cm、5cm、10cm、20cm、40cm、60cm、80cm和100cm处，土壤水分传感器埋设深度为2cm、5cm、10cm、20cm、40cm、60cm和100cm；土壤热流板（2块）埋设在地下2cm处，其中一块埋设在植被下方，另一块埋设在棵间。观测数据的处理与质量控制：（1）确保每天144个数据（每10min），若出现数据的缺失，则由-6999标示；（2）剔除有重复记录的时刻；（3）删除了明显超出物理意义或超出仪器量程的数据；（4）日期和时间的格式统一，并且日期、时间在同一列。如，时间为：2010-6-10 10:30。
自动气象站发布的数据包括：日期/时间Date/Time，空气温湿观测（Ta_12.5m，RH_12.5m）（℃，%），风速（Ws_12.7m）（m/s），风向（WD_12.7m）（°），气压（Press）（hpa），降水（Rain）（mm），四分量辐射（DR、UR、DLR_Cor、ULR_Cor、Rn）（W/m2），地表辐射温度（IRT_1、IRT_2）（℃），土壤热通量（Gs_1、Gs_2）（W/m2）、多层土壤水分（Ms_2cm、Ms_5cm、Ms_10cm、Ms_20cm、Ms_40cm、Ms_60cm、Ms_100cm）（%）和多层土壤温度（Ts_0cm、Ts_2cm、Ts_5cm、Ts_10cm、Ts_20cm、Ts_40cm、Ts_60cm、Ts_80cm、Ts_100cm ）（℃） 。

观测试验或站点信息请参考 Jia et al,(2012)，数据处理请参考Liu et al.(2013)。

background: Aerodynamic roughness length (z0m) is a key factor in surface flux estimations with remote sensing algorithms and/or land surface models. Originally, z0m is defined as the height where the wind speed, given by the extrapolation of the logarithmic wind profile, becomes zero. According to numerous observations, the variation range of z0m over different surfaces is large, from an order of 1.0 m over urban areas and mountainous areas, to an order of 0.1 mm or even 0.01 mm over smooth water body surfaces, ice and snow surfaces. The traditional way to calculate z0m is based on the Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory, using wind profile measurements. In practical applications, especially for remote sensing models and land surface models, it is difficult to obtain z0m for a local or regional scale based only on station observations. Former researchers have proposed some parameterizations between the aerodynamic roughness length and the land surface properties [e.g., vegetation height, leaf area index (LAI), etc.], since wind turbulence is controlled by the structure and spacing of roughness elements (plants and other obstacles) on the land surface, and z0m describes the roughness characteristics of a surface.
research objective: Based on the data of the Xiaotangshan Experiment (Changping District of Beijing, China), which was conducted in 2002, 2004, and 2005 respectively, the objectives of this paper are: (1) to calculate z0m over different surfaces and analyze the directional characteristics of z0m over heterogeneous surfaces using an analytical footprint model; (2) to relate the estimated z0m over heterogeneous surfaces to roughness element characteristic factors, and present a heuristic parameterization of z0m as a reference for model parameterizations.
challenges: More data is needed for further discussions.
methods: This paper calculates z0m over several land surfaces, with 3 years of experimental data from Xiaotangshan. Individual z0m over each surface component (patch) is calculated firstly with the characteristic parameters of the roughness elements (vegetation height, leaf area index, etc.), then z0m over the whole experimental field is aggregated, using the footprint weighting method.
dataset: This experiment was carried out at the Xiaotangshan Experimental Station for Precision Agriculture (40°10′41′′N, 116°26′52′′E, 35 m above sea level) in Beijing. The observation period in 2002 was from 26 March to 23 April and the land cover was bare soil. In 2004, the experiment was carried out from 30 May to 7 July. In the southern sub-plot field, the land cover was bare soil between 30 May and 11 June, while the maize plants started emerging around 12 June. In 2005, the experiment was from 1 May to 10 June and the experimental layout was almost the same as that in 2004.
findings: The results show that z0m is direction-dependent, mainly due to the heterogeneity of the size and spatial distribution of the roughness elements inside the source area along different wind directions.
backgroundCn: 气动粗糙长度（z0m）是通过遥感算法和/或陆面模型进行表面通量估算的关键因素。z0m最初被定义为风速通过对数风速剖面的外推在某一高度变为零的高度。根据众多观测，不同表面上z0m的变化范围很大，城市和山区的z0m约为1.0米，而光滑水体表面、冰面和雪面上的z0m则约为0.1毫米甚至0.01毫米。传统上，z0m的计算基于Monin-Obukhov相似理论，使用风速剖面测量。在实际应用中，特别是在遥感模型和陆面模型中，仅依靠站点观测很难获得局部或区域尺度的z0m。以前的研究者提出了一些气动粗糙长度与地表特性（如植被高度、叶面积指数（LAI）等）之间的参数化关系，因为风的湍流受地表粗糙元素（植物和其他障碍物）的结构和间距的控制，而z0m描述了表面的粗糙特性。
research objectiveCn: 根据2002年、2004年和2005年在中国北京昌平区进行的Xiaotangshan实验的数据，本文的目标是：(1) 计算不同表面的z0m，并利用分析足迹模型分析异质表面上z0m的方向特征；(2) 将估算的异质表面上的z0m与粗糙元素特征因子相关联，并提出z0m的启发式参数化，以作为模型参数化的参考。
challengesCn: 需要更多数据以进行进一步讨论。
methodsCn: 本文计算了多个地表的z0m，使用了来自小汤山的三年实验数据。首先，针对每个表面组成部分（斑块）计算了单独的z0m，使用了粗糙度元素的特征参数（植被高度、叶面积指数等），然后采用足迹加权方法对整个实验场的z0m进行聚合。
datasetCn: 该实验在北京的肖塘山精准农业实验站（北纬40°10′41′′，东经116°26′52′′，海拔35米）进行。2002年的观察期为3月26日至4月23日，土地覆盖为裸土。2004年，实验时间为5月30日至7月7日。在南侧子区，土地覆盖在5月30日至6月11日之间为裸土，而玉米植物大约在6月12日开始萌芽。2005年的实验时间为5月1日至6月10日，实验布局与2004年几乎相同。
findingsCn: 结果表明，z0m是方向依赖的，主要是由于源区内粗糙元素的大小和空间分布在不同风向上的异质性。

background: 感、潜热通量作为反映地－气之间热量与水汽交换强度的重要指标，影响地－气之间的能量平衡，为不同尺度的天气系统提供物质、动力和热力来源，影响地－气之间的水循环过程。 目前传统的地表通量观测方法有许多种，如涡动相关系统（Eddy-Covariance system, EC）、波文比－能量平衡系统和空气动力学方法等。 其中，涡动相关系统是国际上公认的、最可靠的地表通量观测方法，但是观测尺度较小，其空间代表性仅有几十至几百米左右。 大孔径闪烁仪（Large Aperture Scintillometer, LAS），相对于传统的涡动相关系统，能够获得区域尺度（几百米到几公里）的平均感热通量。 由于LAS的观测尺度能较好地匹配卫星像元尺度以及数值天气预报和气候模式的网格尺度，因此，LAS的观测值能够作为遥感估算模型、数值天气预报模式和气候模式的像元／网格尺度的地面相对真值，从而对这些模型／模式进行优化和验证。 LAS的观测原理是基于莫宁－奥布霍夫相似理论（Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory, MOST），结合观测得到的大气折射指数结构参数C2n和相关的气象数据，利用与温度结构参数C2T相关的稳定度普适函数fT，得到地表的区域平均感热通量。
research objective: 利用2009年馆陶站（1－12月）和阿柔站（1－6月和10－11月）的LAS相关数据，分析了LAS观测中莫宁—奥布霍夫相似理论MOST理论的适用性，并探讨了MOST理论适用性的定量判断方法。
challenges: 由于受下垫面覆盖类型、平坦程度、水热状况和天气条件等影响，实际情况很难达到理想的水平均匀假设。 目前国内的大气相似理论研究主要集中于风、温度廓线和湍流方差的相似性关系，然而有关闪烁法中的温度结构参数与湍流特征之间的相似性研究较少。
methods: 在分析LAS数据的MOST理论适用性之前，对EC和LAS数据进行初步处理。 选取2009年馆陶站（1－12月）和阿柔站（1－6月和10－11月）的LAS、EC和AWS数据。
dataset: 馆陶站（36°30′54″N，115°07′39″E）位于河北省馆陶县河寨村，其观测场及周围下垫面为农田，包括冬小麦、玉米和棉花，其中冬小麦与玉米为轮作，冬小麦生长期为10月至次年6月，玉米生长期为6－10月，棉花生长期为5－10月，属于典型的华北平原农田下垫面。 LAS源区内冬小麦（玉米）面积约占45％，棉花约占47％。 阿柔站（38°02′40″N，100°27′53″E）位于黑河上游的河谷地区，其观测场及周围下垫面为典型的高山草地，较为平坦。 源区内的植被株高在生长旺季能达到0．2～0．3m。
findings: （1）在不稳定条件下，大尺度涡旋运动、大气湍流发展状况和温度尺度都能对MOST理论适用性产生显著影响；（2）确立了两种新的MOST理论适用性判断方法，即因子分析法和温度结构参数法，并验证了这两种判断方法是合理、可靠的。

Example.QuestionEn: Provide an example of how aerodynamic roughness length (z0m) is calculated using data from field experiments.
Example.QuestionCn: 提供一个如何使用现场实验数据计算气动粗糙度长度（z0m）的示例。
Example.AnswerEn: An example is the Xiaotangshan Experiment conducted in Beijing, China, which used an analytical footprint model to calculate the aerodynamic roughness length (z0m) over different surfaces. This involved using characteristic parameters of roughness elements, such as vegetation height and leaf area index, and aggregating these with a footprint weighting method to determine z0m for the entire experimental field.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个例子是中国北京进行的小汤山实验，该实验使用分析足迹模型计算不同表面的气动粗糙长度（z0m）。这涉及使用粗糙元素的特征参数，如植被高度和叶面积指数，并通过足迹加权方法将这些参数聚合，以确定整个实验场的z0m。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you give an example of how the Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory is applied in the analysis of data from large aperture scintillometers (LAS)?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否举例说明如何在大孔径闪烁仪（LAS）数据分析中应用Monin-Obukhov相似理论？
Example.AnswerEn: An example is the use of the Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory in analyzing LAS data collected from Guantao Station in 2009. The study examined the applicability of the theory by correlating atmospheric refractive index structure parameters with meteorological data to derive regional average sensible heat fluxes, verifying the theory's applicability under various conditions.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个例子是使用Monin-Obukhov相似理论分析2009年从广陶站收集的激光雷达（LAS）数据。该研究通过将大气折射率结构参数与气象数据相关联，考察了该理论的适用性，以推导区域平均显热通量，并验证了该理论在各种条件下的适用性。

Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 风速外推至零的高度因不同表面而异，与植被高度和叶面积指数有关。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'aerodynamic roughness length (z0m)' mean in the context of surface flux estimations?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在表面通量估计的背景下，“气动粗糙度长度（z0m）”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: Aerodynamic roughness length (z0m) is a key factor in surface flux estimations, defined as the height where the wind speed, extrapolated from a logarithmic wind profile, becomes zero. It varies widely over different surfaces and is traditionally calculated using wind profile measurements based on the Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory.
Definition.AnswerCn: 气动粗糙长度（z0m）是表面通量估算中的一个关键因素，定义为风速从对数风速剖面外推到零的高度。它在不同表面上变化很大，通常基于Monin-Obukhov相似理论通过风速剖面测量进行计算。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the 'Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory' and how is it applied in meteorological observations?
Definition.QuestionCn:
‘Monin-Obukhov相似理论’是一个用于描述大气边界层中湍流特性的重要理论。该理论基于稳定性和风速剖面之间的关系，主要用于理解和预测大气中热量、动量和物质的交换过程。

在气象观测中，Monin-Obukhov相似理论被应用于分析和解释不同高度的风速、温度和其他气象变量的变化。通过使用该理论，气象学家可以更好地理解大气边界层的结构，评估气象模型的准确性，并进行气候研究和环境监测。
Definition.AnswerEn: The Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory (MOST) is a framework used for scaling turbulence in the atmospheric boundary layer. It relates the profiles of mean wind speed and temperature to turbulence characteristics and is applied in meteorological observations to derive parameters like the temperature structure parameter and regional average sensible heat flux, as used in studies involving Large Aperture Scintillometers (LAS).
Definition.AnswerCn: Monin-Obukhov相似理论（MOST）是一个用于在大气边界层中缩放湍流的框架。它将平均风速和温度的剖面与湍流特征相关联，并应用于气象观测中，以推导温度结构参数和区域平均显热通量等参数，这在涉及大孔径闪烁仪（LAS）的研究中得到了应用。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'eddy-covariance system' mean in the context of surface flux measurement methods?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在表面通量测量方法的上下文中，“涡动协方差系统”指的是一种用于测量和分析气体（如二氧化碳、水蒸气等）在地表与大气之间交换的技术。
Definition.AnswerEn: The eddy-covariance system is a recognized method for observing surface fluxes, providing reliable measurements by capturing the covariance between vertical wind speed and scalar quantities (like temperature or humidity) at a high frequency. Though highly accurate, its spatial representativeness is limited to areas of tens to hundreds of meters.
Definition.AnswerCn: 涡度协方差系统是一种公认的观察表面通量的方法，通过以高频率捕捉垂直风速与标量量（如温度或湿度）之间的协方差，提供可靠的测量。尽管其准确性很高，但其空间代表性仅限于几十到几百米的范围。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the similarities and differences in challenges faced when applying the Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory in data collection at 馆陶站 and 阿柔站 compared to using it for estimating surface fluxes in the context of LAS and EC systems?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在馆陶站和阿柔站进行数据收集时，应用Monin-Obukhov相似理论所面临的挑战与在激光雷达（LAS）和涡度协方差（EC）系统中估算表面通量时的挑战之间的相似性和差异性是什么？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Both 馆陶站 and 阿柔站 face challenges related to the assumptions of homogeneity required by the Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory, affected by factors like surface cover and weather conditions. However, while LAS and EC systems at these stations require compatibility with satellite pixel scales, the challenges at 馆陶站 and 阿柔站 focus more on the applicability of the theory under different atmospheric stability conditions and the development of new applicability judgment methods.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 馆陶站和阿柔站都面临与Monin-Obukhov相似性理论所需的均匀性假设相关的挑战，这些挑战受到地表覆盖和天气条件等因素的影响。然而，虽然这两个站的LAS和EC系统需要与卫星像素尺度兼容，但馆陶站和阿柔站面临的挑战更多集中在不同大气稳定性条件下理论的适用性以及新适用性判断方法的开发上。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What implications does the variability in aerodynamic roughness length (z0m) have for remote sensing algorithms and land surface models, particularly in heterogeneous environments?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 气动粗糙长度（z0m）的变异性对遥感算法和陆面模型在异质环境中的应用有什么影响？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Variability in z0m affects the accuracy of remote sensing algorithms and land surface models because it influences the calculation of surface fluxes. In heterogeneous environments, where z0m varies with vegetation and surface characteristics, models must account for directional dependencies and integrate spatial variability to improve accuracy. This is demonstrated in the Xiaotangshan data, where z0m's directional characteristics are linked to roughness element distribution.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: z0m的变异性影响遥感算法和地表模型的准确性，因为它影响表面通量的计算。在异质环境中，z0m随着植被和表面特征的变化而变化，模型必须考虑方向依赖性并整合空间变异性以提高准确性。这在小塘山数据中得到了证明，z0m的方向特征与粗糙度元素的分布相关。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the challenges in obtaining aerodynamic roughness length (z0m) for local or regional scales using station observations?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 获取局部或区域尺度的气动粗糙度长度（z0m）时，站点观测面临的挑战因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: It is difficult to obtain aerodynamic roughness length (z0m) for local or regional scales from station observations because wind turbulence is influenced by the structure and spacing of roughness elements on the land surface. The variation range of z0m is large due to different surfaces, and traditional methods require wind profile measurements, which may not be feasible for larger scales.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 从站点观测中获取局部或区域尺度的气动粗糙长度（z0m）是困难的，因为风的湍流受到地表粗糙元素的结构和间距的影响。由于不同表面的差异，z0m的变化范围很大，传统方法需要风速剖面测量，而这在较大尺度上可能不可行。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the difficulty in extending the spatial representativeness of Eddy-Covariance system measurements beyond small scales?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致在小尺度之外扩展涡动协方差系统测量的空间代表性困难的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The Eddy-Covariance system, while reliable for surface flux observations, has a limited spatial representativeness of only a few dozen to a few hundred meters. This is because its measurements are designed for smaller, more localized areas, making it challenging to extend to larger regional scales, which is why alternatives like Large Aperture Scintillometer (LAS) are considered for broader applications.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 涡度协方差系统虽然在表面通量观测方面可靠，但其空间代表性仅限于几十米到几百米。这是因为其测量设计用于较小、局部的区域，使得在更大区域尺度上扩展变得具有挑战性，这也是为什么像大孔径闪烁仪（LAS）这样的替代方案被考虑用于更广泛应用的原因。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential outcomes of implementing automated meteorological stations with a high-frequency data collection method in agricultural areas?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在农业地区实施高频数据收集方法的自动气象站的潜在结果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Implementing automated meteorological stations with high-frequency data collection, such as every 10 seconds, can lead to more accurate and granular datasets that reflect real-time changes in meteorological conditions. This can improve the understanding of microclimate variations in agricultural areas, aid in precise agricultural management, and enhance the accuracy of weather models and forecasts.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 实施自动气象站，进行高频数据采集，例如每10秒一次，可以生成更准确和细致的数据集，反映气象条件的实时变化。这可以改善对农业地区微气候变化的理解，帮助进行精确的农业管理，并提高天气模型和预报的准确性。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the consequences of using the Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory in analyzing data from large aperture scintillometers in terms of data accuracy and model validation?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用Monin-Obukhov相似理论分析大孔径闪烁仪数据的后果是什么，涉及数据准确性和模型验证方面。
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using the Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory for analyzing data from large aperture scintillometers can provide regional scale estimates of sensible heat fluxes, which are crucial for model validation and optimization. However, its applicability can be limited by assumptions of horizontal homogeneity, and factors like large-scale eddy motions and atmospheric turbulence can impact its accuracy, necessitating the development of new assessment methods for its applicability.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用Monin-Obukhov相似理论分析大孔径闪烁仪的数据可以提供区域尺度的显热通量估计，这对于模型验证和优化至关重要。然而，其适用性可能受到水平均匀性假设的限制，大尺度涡动和大气湍流等因素可能会影响其准确性，因此需要开发新的评估方法来检验其适用性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methodologies are employed to ensure the quality and accuracy of data collected from automatic weather stations in agricultural areas?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 为了确保从农业地区的自动气象站收集的数据的质量和准确性，采用了哪些方法论？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The data collected from automatic weather stations are processed and quality controlled by ensuring a fixed number of data points per day, marking missing data with a specific placeholder, removing duplicate records, and deleting data that fall outside the physical or instrumental range. The date and time are also standardized for consistency.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 从自动气象站收集的数据经过处理和质量控制，确保每天有固定数量的数据点，用特定的占位符标记缺失数据，删除重复记录，并删除超出物理或仪器范围的数据。同时，日期和时间也进行了标准化以确保一致性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What is the procedure for using Large Aperture Scintillometer (LAS) data to analyze the applicability of Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory (MOST) in different land cover conditions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 使用大孔径闪烁仪（LAS）数据分析Monin-Obukhov相似理论（MOST）在不同土地覆盖条件下适用性的程序是什么？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Before analyzing LAS data for MOST theory applicability, preliminary processing of LAS, EC, and AWS data is conducted. The analysis involves selecting relevant LAS data and considering factors such as atmospheric turbulence and temperature scale under unstable conditions. New methods like factor analysis and temperature structure parameter analysis are used to establish and verify the applicability of MOST theory.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 在分析LAS数据以验证MOST理论的适用性之前，首先对LAS、EC和AWS数据进行初步处理。分析涉及选择相关的LAS数据，并考虑大气湍流和不稳定条件下的温度尺度等因素。采用因子分析和温度结构参数分析等新方法来建立和验证MOST理论的适用性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methodologies enable the accurate measurement of soil temperature and moisture at various depths in agricultural fields?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些方法能够准确测量农业田地中不同深度的土壤温度和湿度？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The methodologies include the use of soil temperature probes and soil moisture sensors placed at different depths ranging from 0cm to 100cm, as described in the observation data collection methods.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 这些方法包括使用土壤温度探头和土壤湿度传感器，放置在从0厘米到100厘米的不同深度，如观察数据收集方法中所述。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How does the integration of Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory (MOST) enable the estimation of surface fluxes over agricultural landscapes?
Enablement.QuestionCn: Monin-Obukhov相似理论（MOST）的整合如何使得在农业景观上估算表面通量成为可能？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The integration of MOST with atmospheric refractive index structure parameter data and related meteorological data allows for the calculation of regional average sensible heat flux, facilitating surface flux estimations over agricultural landscapes.
Enablement.AnswerCn: MOST与大气折射率结构参数数据及相关气象数据的集成，使得能够计算区域平均显热通量，从而促进对农业景观表面通量的估算。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What conditions or technologies enable the reliable operation of automatic weather stations for continuous data collection over multiple years?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些条件或技术使自动气象站能够在多个年份内可靠地进行连续数据收集？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The use of automatic weather stations with sensors for air temperature, relative humidity, wind speed and direction, pressure, rainfall, radiation, and soil parameters, along with a data processing and quality control system, enables reliable continuous data collection over multiple years.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 使用自动气象站配备空气温度、相对湿度、风速和风向、气压、降雨量、辐射和土壤参数传感器，以及数据处理和质量控制系统，可以实现多年可靠的连续数据收集。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why is it challenging to apply Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory (MOST) in certain observational environments, and what data collection techniques could enhance its applicability?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么在某些观测环境中应用Monin-Obukhov相似理论（MOST）具有挑战性，以及哪些数据收集技术可以增强其适用性？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The applicability of MOST is influenced by factors such as surface coverage type, flatness, water-heat conditions, and weather. The use of Large Aperture Scintillometer (LAS) and Eddy-Covariance system (EC) data, as well as the establishment of new methods like factor analysis and temperature structure parameter methods, can enhance the applicability of MOST by providing reliable assessments of turbulence and temperature structure.
Expectation.AnswerCn: MOST的适用性受到表面覆盖类型、平坦度、水热条件和天气等因素的影响。使用大孔径闪烁计（LAS）和涡度协方差系统（EC）数据，以及建立新的方法如因子分析和温度结构参数方法，可以通过提供可靠的湍流和温度结构评估来增强MOST的适用性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What are the potential challenges of using remote sensing models to estimate aerodynamic roughness length (z0m) over various surfaces, and how can datasets be improved to address these challenges?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 使用遥感模型估计不同表面上的气动粗糙度长度（z0m）可能面临的挑战有哪些？如何改进数据集以应对这些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Remote sensing models face challenges in estimating z0m due to the difficulty in obtaining z0m for local or regional scales from station observations alone. The use of parameterizations that relate z0m to roughness element characteristics like vegetation height and leaf area index, as well as employing datasets that integrate footprint weighting methods, can improve the accuracy and applicability of these models.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 遥感模型在估计z0m时面临挑战，因为仅通过站点观测很难获得地方或区域尺度的z0m。使用将z0m与粗糙度元素特征（如植被高度和叶面积指数）相关联的参数化方法，以及采用集成了足迹加权方法的数据集，可以提高这些模型的准确性和适用性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In what ways might the data collection frequency and coverage at the automatic weather station impact the accuracy and reliability of meteorological observations?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 自动气象站的数据收集频率和覆盖范围如何影响气象观测的准确性和可靠性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The automatic weather station collects data every 10 seconds and outputs it every 10 minutes, which provides a robust dataset for capturing dynamic meteorological changes. However, any missing data is marked with -6999, which could affect data continuity and reliability. The station's thorough data processing and quality control – including removing duplicate records and out-of-range data – aim to enhance accuracy. Yet, ensuring that data collection is consistent and representative across all relevant meteorological conditions remains crucial for reliability.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 自动气象站每10秒收集一次数据，并每10分钟输出一次，这为捕捉动态气象变化提供了强大的数据集。然而，任何缺失的数据都标记为-6999，这可能会影响数据的连续性和可靠性。该站点的全面数据处理和质量控制，包括删除重复记录和超出范围的数据，旨在提高准确性。然而，确保数据收集在所有相关气象条件下保持一致和具有代表性，对于可靠性仍然至关重要。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What are the implications of using different scales of observation instruments, such as the Eddy-Covariance system and Large Aperture Scintillometer, for surface flux measurements?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 使用不同观测仪器的量测尺度，如涡度协方差系统和大孔径闪烁仪，对表面通量测量的影响是什么？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The use of instruments like the Eddy-Covariance system, which is internationally recognized for its reliability but limited to smaller spatial scales, contrasts with the Large Aperture Scintillometer, which can capture regional scale fluxes. The latter's ability to match better with satellite pixel scales and model grid scales makes it valuable for remote sensing estimations and model validations. However, ensuring the accuracy of flux measurements across these different scales remains a challenge, particularly when applying theoretical models like the Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 使用像涡度协方差系统这样的仪器，虽然在国际上被认为是可靠的，但其适用范围仅限于较小的空间尺度，这与大型孔径闪烁仪形成对比，后者能够捕捉区域尺度的通量。大型孔径闪烁仪更好地与卫星像素尺度和模型网格尺度相匹配，使其在遥感估算和模型验证中具有重要价值。然而，确保在这些不同尺度上通量测量的准确性仍然是一个挑战，特别是在应用像莫宁-奥布霍夫相似理论这样的理论模型时。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about how data from large aperture scintillometers can be processed to align with satellite pixel scales.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不确定如何处理大孔径闪烁仪的数据以与卫星像素尺度对齐。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Large Aperture Scintillometers (LAS) provide regional scale average sensible heat flux, which matches well with satellite pixel scales. This is because LAS data is based on Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory, which involves measuring atmospheric refractive index structure parameters and meteorological data, allowing for scaling to the spatial grid of satellite models.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 大型孔径闪烁仪（LAS）提供区域尺度的平均显热通量，这与卫星像素尺度非常匹配。这是因为LAS数据基于Monin-Obukhov相似理论，通过测量大气折射率结构参数和气象数据，能够扩展到卫星模型的空间网格。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of the challenges faced in ensuring data quality and consistency in multi-year meteorological observations.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解在确保多年气象观测数据质量和一致性方面面临的挑战。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Data quality and consistency challenges in multi-year meteorological observations include ensuring the completeness of data (e.g., 144 data points daily), removing duplicate records, and filtering out values that exceed physical or instrumental limits. Consistent formatting of date and time is also crucial, alongside using standard procedures for data processing and quality control as outlined in the references such as Liu et al. (2013).
Assertion.AnswerCn: 多年度气象观测中的数据质量和一致性挑战包括确保数据的完整性（例如，每天144个数据点）、去除重复记录以及过滤超出物理或仪器限制的值。日期和时间的一致格式也至关重要，同时需要使用标准的数据处理和质量控制程序，如Liu等人（2013）所述。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze the data collection methods used for observing aerodynamic roughness length (z0m) and suggest potential improvements or alternative methodologies.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请分析用于观察气动粗糙度长度（z0m）的数据收集方法，并建议潜在的改进或替代方法。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The traditional method for calculating aerodynamic roughness length (z0m) is based on the Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory, using wind profile measurements. In practical applications, especially for remote sensing models and land surface models, obtaining z0m for a local or regional scale using only station observations is challenging. Researchers have suggested parameterizations between aerodynamic roughness length and land surface properties. Using experimental data and analytical footprint models, z0m over different surfaces can be calculated and related to roughness element characteristics. Improvements could involve more comprehensive data collection over various surfaces and conditions, or the development of higher-resolution remote sensing techniques.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 传统的气动粗糙度长度（z0m）计算方法基于莫宁-奥布霍夫相似理论，使用风剖面测量。在实际应用中，尤其是对于遥感模型和陆面模型，仅通过站点观测获取局部或区域尺度的z0m是具有挑战性的。研究人员提出了气动粗糙度长度与地表特性之间的参数化关系。通过实验数据和分析足迹模型，可以计算不同表面上的z0m，并将其与粗糙度元素特征相关联。改进的方向可能包括在各种表面和条件下进行更全面的数据收集，或开发更高分辨率的遥感技术。
